goals.complete: The Flame Legion is planning simultaneous attacks on Blood and Iron, designed to turn them against each other. Tribune Desertgrave needs this information right away.

goals.active: Rendezvous with Tribune Desertgrave at Junker's Scrapyard.
goals.complete: Tribune Desertgrave believes the Ash Legion can stop the Flame attacks on Blood and Iron. I've been ordered to stop one attack, while Fengar Cruelmane stops the other.
